name: Meltdown (itch) (rafatic)
description:
Welcome to MELTDOWN !

MELTDOWN is about a nuclear reactor about to enter meltdown !

But this time, you'll want to embrace and encourage the meltdown by preventing the repairmen from fixing the reactor and lowering the unstability.

Your objective is simple : raise the unstability bar a high as possible by using the differents skills and tools at your disposition :

- Bully the workers :  clicking the repairmen around the floor damages them (enjoy it, it's free !).

- Cause a power surge :  the room is filled with repair stations used by workers to lower the reactor unstability. Invest some unstability to strike them with a power surge to kill the workers and disable the station.

- Jam the doors : reinforcements are coming ! Jam the doors to prevent additional workers from entering !

 - Cryostasis : Activate the emergency security measures and freeze the whole place to death ! This will clean the whole room ! But beware, it will also cool your reactor significantly.
